div.p: I went to do a 2 year National Diploma Course at Gloucester College but before that I had to do a First Diploma because my GCSEs were so poor
I had to do a First Diploma in Art and Design for 1 year so 3 years at college... The hardest thing was I don’t think I, I can’t remember
any difficulties like you know I was homeless and you know getting to college because I was moving all over Gloucestershire
for accommodation one night here, one night there so I had to get back to Gloucester and then I had my home in a sports bag
that was probably the hardest, nothing to do with the course itself you know...
I knew that I had to learn this to be who I wanted to be like you know this is all important to my career like you know that I wanted to do
so I soaked it all in, you know, but I had some like real bad domestic like home life outside of college which affected it
so my concentration was to obviously attend and just to pass so “right your grades are... you can’t do the course any more”
because obviously teachers would put pressure on you like that which is good because it kept you going like but
yeah I loved everything about the education of photography, you know it’s what I wanted to do
